schema.howPerformed: Your documentation request begins with a consultation (brief in-person, video call, or detailed phone discussion) where Dr. Abbas reviews your medical history, current health status, and the specific requirements for your letter, form, or referral. For new patients, a medical assessment is necessary to verify facts before documentation. For existing patients, we review your medical records. Dr. Abbas then personally prepares the document on official headed paper with GMC registration details, ensuring all required information is accurate and comprehensive. For specialist referrals, we may contact the consultant directly to discuss your case and ensure appropriate onward care. For visa or embassy documentation, we follow specific country requirements precisely. All documents include relevant medical history, examination findings, test results, diagnoses, treatment plans, and prognoses as required. Documents are reviewed for accuracy, digitally signed (or wet-signed if required), and delivered securely via encrypted email or courier. Standard turnaround is 24-48 hours; urgent requests accommodated same-day when possible
schema.preparation: Gather all relevant medical information: recent test results, imaging reports, hospital discharge summaries, medication lists, and any previous specialist letters. For visa medicals, bring embassy requirements document and passport. For insurance claims, have policy details and claim forms ready. Write down exactly what the document needs to state and who it's addressed to. For referrals, note your preferred consultant or hospital. Be clear about deadlines (we prioritize urgent requests)
schema.followup: Receive digital PDF copy via secure email, usually within 24-48 hours. Hard copies can be printed on premium letterhead and couriered if required (UK or international). We can send documents directly to embassies, insurers, consultants, or employers as requested. For specialist referrals, our team liaises with the consultant's office to book your appointment and ensure they receive all necessary information beforehand. Follow-up amendments or additional copies provided at no extra charge if needed. We maintain copies in your secure medical record for future reference
schema.outcome: You receive professionally prepared, accurate medical documentation that meets all requirements for your specific need. No rejections or delays due to incomplete or incorrect information—we get it right first time. Direct access to London's leading consultants through our established referral network, often with expedited appointment times. Peace of mind that your medical information is presented clearly and comprehensively. For visa and travel documents, confidence that embassy requirements are fully met. For insurance claims, maximize approval chances with thorough medical evidence. For occupational health, clear fitness-to-work certification with appropriate restrictions or accommodations noted
schema.treatmentFrequency: As needed based on administrative requirements (single documents or ongoing occupational health certificates)
schema.adverseOutcome: Minimal—possible delays if medical information is incomplete (we request additional details promptly). Very rarely, document rejected by recipient due to their specific requirements changing (we revise at no charge)
